title: ^Usagi Kaiju (The Giant Rabbit Monster)
^By @redmountainman1
^Made for Text Only Jam 2 [8 Bits to Infinity]
^:br
level1: ^You will grow up strong for sure.
^They took you from the only home you knew.
^The grass was green and the water ran freely.
^They put you in this cage full of pellets and your own poop.
^You cannot talk, but you can eat.
^Keep eating until you have enough food to get bigger and bust out of the cage.
level2: ^The cage door flies open as you roundhouse kick it.
^Full of your own poop, pellets and a tiny water bottle.
^Just who do these people think you are?
^As you hop free from the cage, you hear a sound.
^The little brat is around here somewhere.
^It's too much for a bunny to handle.
^Little rabbits are not good pets for kids.
^But you aren't a small bunny anymore, are you?
^You must get bigger, and teach that toddler a lesson.
level3: ^You feel kicking in your belly as you devour the toddler in one big gulp.
^But what's this? Your owners just came inside.
^They are looking at you, the giant rabbit.
^They come for you with baseball bats.
level4: ^You munch on your owners like frail leaves of romaine.
^The world fades away, and you are back where you started.
^The cage's metal bars rattle as the toddler strikes.
^Over and over again he hits it.
^The little water they left you with spills out of its bowl.
^There is no escape from these hells, but a small rabbit can dream.
gameover: ^You've binkied out, and lay down for a long nap.
^You'll be as good as new in a few hours.
